translation.en: Hello, everybody. Thanks for coming.
translation.es: Hola a todos. Gracias por venir.

translation.en: I am the Lorax. I speak for the trees.
translation.es: Soy el Lorax. A los árboles represento.

translation.en: And I'd like to say a few words, if you please.
translation.es: Y quisiera decir unas palabras, con su consentimiento.

translation.en: Regarding the story that you're about to see
translation.es: La historia que van a ver

translation.en: it actually happened. Just take it from me.
But there's more to this story than what's on the page,
translation.es: Pero esta historia es mucho más que un simple guión,

translation.en: so please pay attention while I set the stage.
translation.es: así que presten atención mientras les doy la introducción. BIENVENIDOS FNIDVIL ¡FANTÁSTICA! ¡HECHA DE PLÁSTICO!

translation.en: We open in Thneedville, a city they say that was plastic and fake,
translation.es: BIENVENIDOS FNIDVIL ¡FANTÁSTICA! ¡HECHA DE PLÁSTICO! Comenzamos en Fnidvil, una ciudad de plástico donde todo era artificial,

translation.en: and they liked it that way!
translation.es: y ¡a los residentes les parecía ideal!

translation.en: A town without nature, not one living tree.
translation.es: Un pueblo sin naturaleza, ni un solo árbol con vida.

translation.en: So, what happened to them?
Cue the music! Let's see.
AUTOMATED VOICE: Buzz. Buzz.
(ALL SINGING) In Thneedville, it's a brand new dawn
With brand new cars and houses and lawns
translation.es: Y nuevo igual mi auto ha de ser

translation.en: Here in Got- all- that- we- need- ville
In Thneedville, we manufacture our trees
translation.es: En Fnidvil, un árbol no es natural

translation.en: Each one is made in factories
And uses 96 batteries
In Thneedville, the air's not so clean
translation.es: En Fnidvil, no hay el aire ideal

translation.en: So we buy it fresh
It comes out this machine!
In Satisfaction's- guaranteed- ville
In Thneedville, we don't want to know
Where the smog and trash and chemicals go
translation.es: De hacia dónde va nuestra polución

translation.en: I just went swimming, and now I glow
translation.es: Si nadas, brillas como el neón

translation.en: In Thneedville, we have fun year round
We surf and snowboard right in town
translation.es: Surf y esquí, qué gran combinación

translation.en: We thank the Lord for all we've got
Including this brand new parking lot!
Parking lot!
Parking lot!
Oh, look, it's Aloysius O'Hare
Aloysius O'Hare
The man who found a way to sell air
translation.es: El que inventó el aire vender

translation.en: And became a zillionaire
Hip- hip- hooray!
In Thneedville, we love living this way
translation.es: En Fnidvil, nuestra vida es lo ideal

translation.en: It's like living in paradise
It's perfect! And that's how it will stay Oh, yeah!
Here in Love- the- life- we- lead- ville Destined- to- succeed- ville
We- are- all- agreed- ville
We love it here in...
Thneedville!
Yes!
Oh, hi, Ted.
Oh, hey, Audrey. Hi.
Did your ball land in my backyard again?
translation.es: ¿Tu pelota cayó en mi jardín otra vez?

translation.en: What? No.
A model airplane, this time.
Hey, do you want to see something cool?
Come on.
Whoa!
Did you...
Did you paint this?
Do you like it? What?
Are you kidding? This is amazing!
What are those?
Those are trees. Real ones.
They used to grow all around here.
And people said that the touch of their tufts was softer than anything, even silk.
translation.es: El roce de sus matas, dicen, era más suave que cualquier otra cosa, incluso la seda.

translation.en: And they smelled like butterfly milk!
Wow! What does that even mean?
I know, right?
Oh, yeah.
What I want more than anything in the whole world is to see
translation.es: Lo que más deseo en el mundo es ver

translation.en: a real living tree
growing in my backyard.
So if, say... I'm just thinking out loud here.
translation.es: Así que si... Solo estoy pensando en voz alta.

translation.en: If a guy somehow got you one...
translation.es: Si un chico, de alguna forma, te consiguiera uno...

translation.en: I'd probably marry him on the spot.
translation.es: Seguramente me casaría con él ahí mismo.

translation.en: I bet that sounds crazy. Does that sound crazy?
No! Not crazy. (CLEARS THROAT)
Not crazy at all.
Ted, honey, don't play with your food.
translation.es: Ted, cariño, no juegues con la comida.

translation.en: You, either, Mom.
So, Mom, do you happen to know if there's any place
translation.es: Mamá, ¿por casualidad sabes si hay algún lugar

translation.en: where I could get a real tree?
translation.es: donde pueda conseguir un árbol de verdad?

translation.en: Ted, we already have a tree. It's the latest model.
translation.es: Ted, ya tenemos un árbol. Es el último modelo que salió.

translation.en: Yeah, but I mean a real one that grows out of the ground or whatever.
translation.es: Sí, pero me refiero a un árbol real, de los que crecen de la tierra o como sea.

translation.en: You know, a real tree.
Really?
You would rather have some dirty, messy
lump of wood that just sticks out of the ground?
translation.es: sucio y salvaje que crece de la tierra?

translation.en: And it does what? I don't even know what it does. What's its purpose?
translation.es: Y ¿qué hace? Ni siquiera sé qué hace. ¿Para qué sirve?

translation.en: Look at what we've got.
It's the Oak- amatic. The only tree with its own remote.
translation.es: Es el Robleautomático. El único árbol a control remoto.

translation.en: Summer, autumn, winter,
and disco!
Mom? Come on, Ted. Get into it.
Dance with the tree.
Oh, it hurts, Mom. Please stop. (MUSIC STOPS)
translation.es: Me arden los ojos, mamá. Detenlo.

translation.en: So, anyway...
Let's just say I need a tree. Where would I go? What do I do?
translation.es: Digamos que necesito un árbol. ¿Adónde debo ir? ¿Qué hago?

translation.en: Then you know what? You need to find the Once- ler.
translation.es: Entonces ¿sabes qué? Debes encontrar al Once-ler.

translation.en: (STAMMERS) The what?
translation.es: El ¿qué? Mamá, no es momento para una de tus fábulas mágicas, ¿sí?

translation.en: Mom, it's not really the time for one of your magical fables, okay?
translation.es: Mamá, no es momento para una de tus fábulas mágicas, ¿sí?

translation.en: (LAUGHS) That's right, I forgot.
I'm old and can't even remember to put my teeth in.
translation.es: Soy vieja y no me acuerdo ni de ponerme los dientes postizos.

translation.en: Stand down. That's not what I meant.
translation.es: Tranquila. No me refería a eso.

translation.en: No, really, I forgot my teeth.
translation.es: No, en serio, olvidé mis dientes.

translation.en: Would you be a dear and go get them for me?
(SIGHS) Sure, Mom.
Okay, here's the deal.
The Once- ler is the man who knows what happened to the trees.
translation.es: El Once-ler es el hombre que sabe qué le pasó a los árboles.

translation.en: You want one, you need to find him.
translation.es: Si quieres uno, debes encontrarlo a él.

translation.en: The Once- ler? Mmm- hmm.
Okay. Grammy, is this a real thing that we're talking about now?
translation.es: Bien. Abuela, ¿estamos hablando de algo real?

translation.en: Oh, he's real all right.
Well, where can I find him?
Far outside of town where the grass never grows
translation.es: Lejos en las afueras del pueblo donde el césped es solo un recuerdo,

translation.en: and the wind smells slow and sour when it blows.
translation.es: y el viento huele a amargura y encierro cuando sopla en el cielo.

translation.en: And no birds ever sing, excepting old crows.
translation.es: Y no cantan los pájaros, excepto los cuervos.

translation.en: Quit doing that.
That's the place where the Once- ler lives.
translation.es: Ese es el lugar donde vive el Once-ler.

translation.en: Wait, outside of town?
People used to say if you brought him 15 cents,
translation.es: La gente solía decir que si le llevabas 15 centavos,

translation.en: a nail
and the shell of a great, great, great grandfather snail,
translation.es: y el caparazón de un caracol muy anciano,

translation.en: he would tell you everything.
(SCREAMS)
Mr. O'Hare, what we've got for you is something that is going to take O'Hare Air
translation.es: Sr. Ojer, tenemos para usted algo que llevará a Aire Ojer

translation.en: to the next level.
Now, Mr. O'Hare, I know what you're thinking.
translation.es: Sr. Ojer, sé lo que está pensando.

translation.en: One, I've gotten rich selling people air that's fresher than the stinky stuff outside.
translation.es: Uno: Me volví rico vendiendo aire que es más puro que el vaho de afuera.

translation.en: Two, and here is the important one,
translation.es: Dos, y esto es lo importante:

translation.en: How can I possibly make even more money?
We can tell you, sir! We can tell you.
Check out this commercial, huh?
Well, here goes another lame Saturday.
translation.es: Y aquí va otro sábado aburrido.

translation.en: Dude, I don't think so!
Hey!
Man!
Oh, yeah!
What!
Yeah!
COMMENTATOR: O'Hare purified air. Freshness to go.
translation.es: Aire purificado Ojer. Frescura para llevar.

translation.en: Please breathe responsibly.
Oh, my goodness. Yeah! Love it.
You got to be kidding me.
You really think people are stupid enough to buy this?
translation.es: ¿Creen que la gente es tan estúpida como para comprar esto?

translation.en: Our research shows that if you put something in a plastic bottle,
translation.es: Nuestra investigación demuestra que si pones algo en una botella de plástico,

translation.en: people will buy it.
Exactly. And...
And what's more, when we build a new factory to make the plastic bottles,
translation.es: Y cuando construyamos una fábrica para hacer las botellas de plástico,

translation.en: the air quality is just going to get worse.
translation.es: la calidad del aire va a empeorar.

translation.en: Which will make people want our air even more, and drive sales where?
translation.es: Lo cual hará que la gente quiera nuestro aire aún más, y llevará las ventas ¿dónde?

translation.en: Through the roof!
So, in other words, the more smog in the sky,
translation.es: En otras palabras, cuanto más esmog generamos,

translation.en: the more people will buy.
See, that's why he's the genius! It even rhymes!
I'm aware it rhymes.
translation.es: Me doy cuenta de que rima.

translation.en: Coats. Big.
What do you two knuckleheads want? I'm in the middle of a meeting!
translation.es: ¿Qué quieren ustedes dos, cabezas huecas? ¡Estoy en una reunión!

translation.en: What?
Why is he leaving town?
translation.es: ¿Por qué se va de la ciudad?

translation.en: No one ever leaves town!
See what he's up to.
Whoa!
Huh?
Oh, man.
All right.
Okay.
What the...
Who are you?
Who are you and what are you doing here?
I'm Ted. I'm Ted.
I can't breathe. Are you the Once- ler?
translation.es: No puedo respirar. ¿Tú eres el Once-ler?

translation.en: Oh, man. Didn't you read the signs?
No one is supposed to come here.
Get out of here and leave me alone!
And don't let the boot hit you on the way out.
translation.es: Y que no te patee la bota al marcharte.

translation.en: The boot?
Hello!
Listen! People say that if someone brings you this stuff
translation.es: ¡Escucha! Me dijeron que si te traía estas cosas,

translation.en: that you will tell them about trees.
No, no, no!
Trees?
Yeah, real ones.
You know, that grow out of the ground?
Hello?
Sorry, it's just...
Well, I didn't think anyone still cared about trees.

translation.en: Well, that's me. The guy who still cares. I'm here.
translation.es: Ese soy yo. El tipo al que aún le interesan los árboles. Aquí estoy.

translation.en: Hey! What?
Do you want to know about trees? About what happened to them?
translation.es: ¿Quieres saber sobre los árboles? ¿Sobre lo que les pasó?

translation.en: Why they're all gone? It's because of me.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no ha quedado ninguno? Es por mí.

translation.en: Wait, what?
It's because of me!
And my invention, the Thneed.
translation.es: Y mi invento, el Fnid. Era un producto increíble que tenía mil funciones.

translation.en: It was an amazing product that could do the job of a thousand.
translation.es: Era un producto increíble que tenía mil funciones.

translation.en: All right.
Sounds ridiculous, but I mean, that's cool.
You're darn right it was cool!
It all started a long time ago.
Can we start not so long ago, maybe?
Do you want a tree?
Yes, yes.
Then it all started a long, long time ago.
translation.es: Entonces todo comenzó hace mucho, mucho tiempo.

translation.en: I was a young man leaving home.
translation.es: Yo era un jovencito que se iba de su casa.

translation.en: Well, here I go, Mom. Off to change the world with my Thneed.
translation.es: Aquí voy, mamá. Voy a cambiar el mundo con mi Fnid.

translation.en: I'm actually doing it!
Yes, but just remember, Oncie,
if somehow your invention ends up a failure instead of a success,
translation.es: si, por algún motivo, tu invento termina siendo un fracaso en vez de un éxito,

translation.en: oh, it wouldn't surprise me at all!
Nice wheels.
Burn!
Yeah, Burn!
But you will see, okay? I'm going to prove you all wrong.
translation.es: Pero ya verán, ¿sí? Les demostraré que están equivocados.

translation.en: Come on, Melvin!
So, there I was at the very bottom.
translation.es: Ahí estaba yo, un Don Nadie.

translation.en: With nothing but a wagon, a mule,
translation.es: Sin nada más que una carreta, una mula,

translation.en: and a completely irrational sense of optimism.
translation.es: y un sentimiento totalmente irracional de optimismo.

translation.en: I was searching the globe,
obsessed with finding the perfect material for my Thneed.
translation.es: obsesionado con encontrar el material perfecto para hacer mi Fnid.

translation.en: But I'd had absolutely no success.
Until one day, I found paradise. (NEIGHS)
translation.es: Hasta que un día encontré el paraíso.

translation.en: We're going to be there soon, I'm sure.
Whoa!
This is the most beautiful place,
translation.es: Este es el lugar más hermoso

translation.en: okay, I have ever seen.
translation.es: que he visto en mi vida.

translation.en: (SINGING) Yeah
(SINGING) This is it
This is the place
These Truffula trees are just what I need

translation.en: Gonna chop one down and make my Thneed

translation.en: But first...
Now you!
That's great!
So now our friendship can begin
Hand in hand, and wing and fin
There's nothing you and I can't do

translation.en: So let's all make my dreams come true
Hey, guys!

translation.en: Come on, where is my back- up chorus?

translation.en: What?
Ah- ha! Oh.
TED: Hey, hey, wait. Wait a minute.
Excuse me?
Yeah, that's awesome.
Feeding junk food to forest animals? That's great.

translation.en: But, uh, is there a musical number where you show me how to get a tree?
translation.es: Pero ¿hay algún número musical donde veo cómo conseguir un árbol?

translation.en: Because I would love to hear that one.
translation.es: Porque me encantaría oírlo. Sí. Después del número musical sobre el muchacho

translation.en: Oh, yes. Right after the musical number about the kid
translation.es: Sí. Después del número musical sobre el muchacho

translation.en: who kept interrupting the story, and was never heard from again.
translation.es: que seguía interrumpiendo la historia, y del cual nunca se volvió a saber.

translation.en: Right, got it. Proceed.
All right, here we go.
About to make a Thneed, about to change the world.
translation.es: Estoy por hacer un Fnid, estoy por cambiar el mundo.

translation.en: Check it out, guys...
Where did everybody go?
Little did I know that by chopping down that tree
translation.es: Lo que yo no sabía era que, al talar ese árbol,

translation.en: I had just summoned a mystical creature as old as time itself.
translation.es: había convocado a un ser místico tan viejo como el tiempo mismo.

translation.en: The legendary, slightly annoying
guardian of the forest.
The Lorax.
Hey! Whoo!
Did you chop down this tree?
Uh... No.
Who did it?
(GASPS) What's that?
I think he did it.
Leave! Vacate the premises! Take your ax and get out!
translation.es: ¡Fuera de aquí! ¡Desaloja las instalaciones! ¡Toma tu hacha y vete!

translation.en: And who are you?
I'm the Lorax! Guardian of the forest.
translation.es: ¡Soy el Lorax! El guardián del bosque.

translation.en: I speak for the trees.
So you're telling me, you just didn't see me magically appear out of that stump?
translation.es: Entonces ¿estás diciendo que no me viste aparecer mágicamente de ese tocón?

translation.en: With all the lightning and thunder and stuff. You didn't see any of that?
translation.es: Con todos los rayos y truenos y demás. ¿No viste nada de eso?

translation.en: No, but that sounds amazing. Can I see some of that?
translation.es: No, pero suena increíble. ¿Puedo ver algo de eso?

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I could show you. But that's not how it works.
translation.es: Sí, podría mostrarte. Pero no funciona así.

translation.en: Okay. Um...
Didn't really happen.
Oh, I know what you want!
translation.es: ¡Ya sé lo que quieres! ¡Tengo uno de estos para la criatura más adorable que he visto!

translation.en: I've got one of these for the cutest little guy I ever saw!
translation.es: ¡Tengo uno de estos para la criatura más adorable que he visto!

translation.en: Yummy, yummy, yummy, yummy, yummy...
How dare you! Give me that!
I'm going to eat this, but I am highly offended by it.
translation.es: Voy a comerlo, pero estoy sumamente ofendido por esto.

translation.en: What are you... Hey, Mustache! Will you stop that?
What's your deal, man?
Time for you to go, Beanpole! Pull them right out.
Just going to put them right back in. We can do this all day.
translation.es: Volveré a ponerlas. Podemos seguir así todo el día.

translation.en: Stop right there! Stop it!
So you would hammer one of nature's innocent creatures?
translation.es: Entonces ¿le darías un martillazo a una criatura inocente de la naturaleza?

translation.en: What? No!
I would never hit this little guy. You, on the other hand,
translation.es: Yo nunca golpearía a este pequeñito. ¡A ti, en cambio,

translation.en: I would gladly pound you and your mustache into the ground!
translation.es: te enterraría bajo tierra con bigote y todo!

translation.en: Behold! The intruder and his violent ways.
translation.es: He aquí el intruso y su violencia.

translation.en: Shame on you. For shame!
All right, you know what? That's it!
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? ¡Se terminó! Escúchame, bola de carne peluda.

translation.en: You listen to me, you furry meatloaf.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? ¡Se terminó! Escúchame, bola de carne peluda. Voy a talar todos los árboles que necesite. ¿Sí?

translation.en: I'm going to chop down as many trees as I need. Okay?
translation.es: Voy a talar todos los árboles que necesite. ¿Sí?

translation.en: Newsflash! Not going anywhere!
translation.es: Y para que lo sepas, ¡no iré a ningún lado!

translation.en: End of story.
Then you leave me no choice.
If you're not gone by the time the sun sets on this valley,
translation.es: Si no te has ido para cuando se ponga el sol en este valle,

translation.en: all the forces of nature will be unleashed upon you
translation.es: todas las fuerzas de la naturaleza se desatarán sobre ti

translation.en: and curse you until the end of your days!
translation.es: y ¡te maldecirán hasta el final de tus días!

translation.en: You have been warned.
Thanks. Yeah, okay.
You have been warned.
But I didn't listen to his warning.
translation.es: Pero yo no escuché su advertencia.

translation.en: And you won't believe what happened that night.
translation.es: Y no vas a creer lo que pasó esa noche.

translation.en: What?
If you want to hear more, come back tomorrow.
translation.es: Si quieres oír más, regresa mañana.

translation.en: Hey, wait, wait! Tomorrow?
Are you serious right now? Ah! You live in the middle of nowhere!
translation.es: ¿Lo dices en serio? ¡Vives en medio de la nada!

translation.en: It stinks out here. Don't make me come back!
I guess you don't really want to hear the rest of the story.
translation.es: Entonces no quieres oír el resto de la historia.

translation.en: No, no.
I do. I really do. I want to hear the story. I just...
translation.es: Sí. Quiero oírla. Quiero oír la historia. Es solo que...

translation.en: Nah! You don't have what it takes. Goodbye.
translation.es: ¡No! No tienes lo que se necesita. Adiós.

translation.en: Wait, wait! I have what it takes.
translation.es: ¡Espera! Sí tengo lo que se necesita.

translation.en: It's all right. It's okay, I'll come back. It's no problem.
translation.es: Está bien. Regresaré. No hay problema.

translation.en: See, here I am, leaving. Walking away now.
I'll see you tomorrow.
Maybe. Just maybe.
What did you wish for, Audrey?
Well, I would love to tell you,
but, sadly, according to the universal wish laws, I cannot.
translation.es: pero según las leyes universales de los deseos, no puedo.

translation.en: TED: I know what she wished for.
Was it, perhaps...
This?
Ted, you didn't.
Oh, no. I totally did.
Happy birthday, Audrey.
Kiss him! Kiss him!
MRS. WIGGINS: Ted.
Ted. Tedster. Huh!
You're kissing the cereal again, hon. What?
translation.es: -Estás besando el cereal otra vez, cariño. -¿Qué?

translation.en: I just... I like this cereal. What one is this? Yeah!
Okay.
Well, I'll make sure to buy extra next time for you.
translation.es: Entonces compraré más para ti la próxima vez.

translation.en: All right, cool. Hey, I got to run. I got to go do a thing.
translation.es: Genial. Debo irme. Tengo que ir a hacer algo.

translation.en: So, I'll see you guys.
You're not going anywhere, young man.
translation.es: No irás a ningún lado, jovencito.

translation.en: (SIGHS) It's Sunday. You know what that means?
translation.es: Es domingo. ¿Sabes lo que significa eso?

translation.en: Family time, and we're all playing board games!
translation.es: Tiempo en familia, y ¡vamos a jugar juegos de mesa!

translation.en: But...
translation.es: Tiempo en familia, y ¡vamos a jugar juegos de mesa! Pero...

translation.en: Oh, man.
Mom, seriously, every turn?
Hey, back off!
No. Okay! Family time is over.
translation.es: -No. -¡Bien! Se acabó el momento en familia.

translation.en: It is now personal time. I'll be in my room.
translation.es: Ahora es momento de los temas personales. Estaré en mi habitación.

translation.en: Okay, dear. Have fun.
I knew I could break her.
translation.es: Sabía que no iba a aguantar.

translation.en: Go. Huh?
Go see him!
Oh, yeah!
You rule! Thank you, Grammy.
Hey! Ted, right?
Um, Mr. O'Hare?
So, I hear you have become interested in trees.
translation.es: Oí que estás interesado en los árboles.

translation.en: What's that all about?
Where did you hear that?
Teddy, there's not much that goes on in Thneedville that I don't know about.
translation.es: Teddy, en Fnidvil no pasan muchas cosas de las que yo no sepa.

translation.en: Here's the deal, I make a living selling fresh air to people.
translation.es: Este es el tema. Yo me gano la vida vendiéndole aire puro a la gente.

translation.en: Trees? They make it for free.
So, when I hear people talking about them, I consider it kind of a threat to my business.
translation.es: Así que si oigo que alguien habla de ellos, lo considero una amenaza para mi negocio.

translation.en: I don't even know what you're talking about.
You listen to me, boy.
Don't go poking around in things you don't understand
translation.es: No te metas donde no te corresponde,

translation.en: or I'll be your worst nightmare.
translation.es: o voy a ser tu peor pesadilla.

translation.en: I'm Frankenstein's head on a spider's body!
translation.es: ¡Soy la cabeza de Frankenstein en el cuerpo de una araña!

translation.en: Yeah, um...
Okay, my mom is expecting me. So, I'm just going to...
translation.es: Mi mamá me está esperando. Así que voy a...

translation.en: Of course, of course. Now, go back to your family game time.
translation.es: Claro, me imagino. Vuelve a tu momento en familia.

translation.en: Grandma just finished her turn.
translation.es: La abuela acaba de terminar su jugada.

translation.en: Please. I have eyes everywhere.
translation.es: Por favor. Yo tengo ojos en todas partes.

translation.en: You got a beautiful town here, Ted.
translation.es: Tienes una ciudad hermosa aquí, Ted.
